Reviews.Title: From Bad to Excellent
Reviews.Author: Scott Young
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone and when I got it I loved it. Unfortunately though it was defective. None of the apps would open and it was always locking up on me. I contacted the seller and He sent me another phone practically overnight at no charge and now I have got a phone that works great. I chose this rating because I had excellent customer service and I would very highly recommend this seller if anyone is looking to buy a new cell phone.

Reviews.Title: Bad phone
Reviews.Author: bradlantz
Reviews.Content: Yes this phone is a bad phone if your used to a 4g phone it is a good 3g phone the company that shipped the product to me is very,very,very cool and is allowing me to ship it back for a partial refund(restocking and such) which im totally fine with. If you can find another item from these guys buy it there great to work with

Reviews.Title: The best place to shop
Reviews.Author: Barbara Turner
Reviews.Content: This was my first time ordering online. Wish was a scary feeling not knowing if I was gonna be satisfied. I really don't like paying my money for merchandise before I actually see it. But I was very much satisfied and would continue.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: b Caldwell
Reviews.Content: This was a great price for a good phone. It was great price for a brand new phone. It came super fast in the mail which i like overall i was happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: jodi
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves this phone. The only thing that was wrong when I received it was that it came with a bad charger that did not charge. So, I had to spend money on buying a new charger. Other than that the phone is great!!

Reviews.Title: My very 1st droid phone! 8D
Reviews.Author: Edward Batey
Reviews.Content: Finally my very 1st smartphone!!! Camera video/still, any format music player, Andoird market, wifi, gps, everything it has I can put in, 'nough said!!! Thanks EastCoast_Wireless!!!

Reviews.Title: BAD
Reviews.Author: Christa Rowland's
Reviews.Content: The Phone does not charge. If the battery dies my son has to get his sisters battery and charge his in her phone. Totally ridiculous!!!!

Reviews.Title: I was in good condtion
Reviews.Author: cclmnl
Reviews.Content: It was used and not sparking new but it is in decent shape, I am currently using the unit works fine,

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: TeresaS1967
Reviews.Content: I was worried about buying a refurbished phone after my son broke his new phone. But this was a great deal and it really was in great condition.If I ever need to replace any of our phones, will most definitely look here first!

Reviews.Title: this phone sucks
Reviews.Author: AmazonJunkie86 "jacob's Mom"
Reviews.Content: Save your money this phone didn't even last a month ! If I could give it no stars I would! I woke up and noticed my phone turning off and on by itself. I thought maybe this happened because I just recently bought a couple of apps off of  the google play store,and it some how screwed up my phone.so I immediately unistalled those apps hoping this would help ,Next thing I know my phone was on airplane mode even though the phone settings said it wasn't.I called verizon and they told me to reset the device, after resetting the device and losing my phone contacts, the phone started to work again. Hooray ! Now I don't have to purchase a new phone ,sadly that excitment was cut short when I noticed the piece of crap went back on airplane mode after ten mins ! I was back to square one now  Smh thankfully I was under warranty with verizon and didn't have to purchase a new phone they just sent me a new phone, well not really new , but thoroughly tested to make sure it was  a bug free device that I just received today, to make a loooong story short please save your money and dnt buy this phone , who knows how long these phones are sitting around collecting dust, until the next victim buys one .

Reviews.Title: The quality of this device is horrible.
Reviews.Author: Trina
Reviews.Content: You can't answer the phone when it rings.  The internet does not work properly.  The device overheats and shuts off.  This phone is a piece of crap.  Sorry I ever considered it.

Reviews.Title: terrible experiencie
Reviews.Author: Edna
Reviews.Content: This experiencie was terrible ¡¡ to late the 1 one was bloked the 2 one does not work bad experience¡

Reviews.Title: Horrible!
Reviews.Author: Kate-Lynn Varney
Reviews.Content: First of all I got charged extra for this s***, on top of that within days it started falling apart. The screws became lose and fell out, the keyboard wouldn't open, the screws tore the keyboard apart when it did open, the back of where the screen is, is falling out because there are no screws and it freezes all the time and I don't even have apps or music on it. Straight bulls***.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Rex
Reviews.Content: Dont waste your money on this phone. It is hard to hear anyone talking to you. The phone shuts off all the time and the screen stays black after phone calls. You have to remove battery and turn the phone back on to use it again.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Ivan
Reviews.Content: This new phone that I received in the mail would not power on.  I checked for any damage and did not find any.  The screen simply does Not TURN O.

Reviews.Title: Waist of Money
Reviews.Author: Laura Jamieson
Reviews.Content: When I got the phone is was in poor condition, scratches and other marks. It won't charge without glitching. However even when it was off the charger it glitched. I will never buy this product again.

Reviews.Title: terrible phone
Reviews.Author: david quinones
Reviews.Content: I got the Cel phone quickly and it was in good shape but it worked terribly. It called people erratically. I ended up having to get another Cel phone.

Reviews.Title: just an ok phone
Reviews.Author: K. Murphy
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son as a replacement until he's do for an upgrade. We don't fine it very easy to configure the phone and I've been a Droid lover from the start. It's sluggish and freezes up on him at times. It'll hold him until we can get a better smartphone. I wouldn't recommend it now though.

Reviews.Title: It's Alright
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Scott "Stephanie"
Reviews.Content: My order came fast and everything, but I would have liked to know that a fourth of the screen on my phone didn't work BEFORE I bought it.

ProductInfo.Name: Motorola Droid A855 Android 2.0 Cell phone 5-megapixel auto-focus camera with video capture for Verizon
